lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling apologized Sunday for racist comments captured on tape, saying they were a "terrible mistake."

headline.main: Clippers' Sterling Apologizes, Says 'Not a Racist'
headline.print_headline: Clippers' Sterling Apologizes, Says 'Not a Racist'

snippet: Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling apologized Sunday for racist comments captured on tape, saying they were a "terrible mistake."...
